name: Export Kanbanize tasks to Google Sheets automatically
description: Every time a new task is created in Kanbanize, Make will automatically import the data to Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqlS6nwi2OfZ6a043ckNcmDMm6ObaGoLpznxWISXyyU/edit?usp=sharing).
